discourse_list.title: Receiving and Paying Wages in DAI with Bitwage

content.content: Bitwage is happy to announce that now professionals can receive their wages in DAI. Also, companies can pay their employees in DAI (and multiple other currencies) or fund their payroll with DAI as well. Professionals willing to receive can signup at ‘Bitwage | Sign Up’ Companies looking forward to pay DAI to their teams or fund payroll with DAI can go to ‘Bitwage | Sign Up’ If you´ve never heard about Bitwage and it´s unique crypto payroll option, you should find valuable information on our Youtube Channel.
